items.sentence: How many classes do you usually have on Mondays?
I don\'t know for certain when he\'ll come back.
I don\'t know how to pronounce Tom\'s last name.
You\'re going to have to live with what you did.
You\'re going to want to take a picture of this.
You\'re making the biggest mistake of your life.
What would\'ve happened to me if I\'d done that?
We\'ll see what the judge has to say about that.
We\'re not exactly sure what we should be doing.
We\'re not supposed to tell Tom about the party.
We\'re trying to have a serious discussion here.
We\'ve been planning this trip for three months.
It\'s very rude of you to say a thing like that.
Just tell me what you want done and I\'ll do it.
Let\'s put this money aside for our summer trip.
Mary baked three dozen cookies for Tom\'s party.
Tom searched for Mary\'s name in the phone book.
Tom seemed really impressed with Mary\'s speech.
How long have you and Tom been working together?
Why don\'t you tell me what happened last night?
I\'ll call Tom and tell him we won\'t be coming.
I\'ll help you after work if I\'m not too tired.
Tom tried to prevent Mary from opening the door.
Tom wanted Mary to come to Boston for Christmas.
Tom wanted to talk to Mary, but she walked away.
Tom wants his children to learn to speak French.
Tom was eating an apple the last time I saw him.
Tom won\'t let anyone except Mary drive his car.
There aren\'t that many synagogues in this city.
There aren\'t the shoes that I bought last week.
No matter what you say, I won\'t change my mind.
Tom doesn\'t seem to think we\'re in any danger.
I didn\'t feel like scolding her for being late.
I think you shouldn\'t invite Tom to your party.
The whole group was punished for Tom\'s mistake.
Tom was in no particular hurry to get back home.
Tom was surprised by how well Mary spoke French.
Tom was the only person in the room at the time.
You can\'t get a job here without a work permit.
You can\'t keep Tom from going to work tomorrow.
You can\'t make an omelet without breaking eggs.
You can\'t really expect Tom to change his mind.
You didn\'t seem to enjoy the concert very much.
Tom doesn\'t think he\'ll be able come tomorrow.
Tom doesn\'t understand what you\'re driving at.
Tom will get a better job with a college degree.
We can communicate with each other in many ways.
We\'ll have lived here for two years next April.
We\'re playing tag. Do you want to play with us?
I\'ll play tennis with Tom later this afternoon.
